definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: He got all the big scoops for the paper.
sentences.chinese: 他为本报弄到所有的头号独家新闻。

sentences.english: BMW still trails Audi as the top luxury car brand in China.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，宝马依然不敌奥迪头号豪华车品牌的地位。

sentences.english: Ali was the cock of the walk for many years in boxing circles .
sentences.chinese: 阿里在拳击圈里当了好几年的头号人物。

sentences.english: What does this sketchy historical record suggest for today's number one power?
sentences.chinese: 上述粗略的历史回顾，对今天的头号强国有何启示呢？

sentences.english: When Ed finds out, Sam agrees to help the FBI capture several key members of the cartel.
sentences.chinese: 艾德发现，曼霞协助警方追查组织的几位头号人物。

sentences.english: He was the No. 1 seed in the table-tennis championship.
sentences.chinese: 他是这届乒乓球锦标赛头号种子选手。

sentences.english: Let me see you become the NO. 1 player, brother.
sentences.chinese: 让我见证你成为头号选手的那一刻吧，兄弟。

sentences.english: It has since been spectacularly renovated and turned into the flagship Celebrity Centre.
sentences.chinese: 它后来被引人注目地改造成了头号名人中心。

sentences.english: TB is the number-one infectious disease killer in the world. Early detection saves lives.
sentences.chinese: 肺结核是全球头号传染病杀手，发现得早能救你一命。

sentences.english: Heat is enemy number one for wine.
sentences.chinese: 高温是葡萄酒的头号敌人。

sentences.english: He was the No. 1 seed in the table-tennis championship.
sentences.chinese: 他是桌球比赛的头号种子选手。

sentences.english: They are the No. 1 predictor of life success as well as wellbeing, as we'll talk about.
sentences.chinese: 它们是人生成功和幸福的头号预言，我们将会谈到。

sentences.english: Saddam Maake bills himself as the number-one fan of the South African team.
sentences.chinese: 萨达姆Maake法案的头号球迷，南非队自己。

sentences.english: The number one criterion for test data selection should be risk.
sentences.chinese: 选择测试数据的头号标准应当是风险。

sentences.english: Of the 2.5 million deaths annually in the United States, the No. 1 killer is heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 美国每年250万件死亡中，头号杀手是心脏疾病。

sentences.english: This week, Serbia arrested one of Europe's most wanted men.
sentences.chinese: 本周塞尔威压逮捕了欧洲头号通缉犯。

definition: minister who has given outstanding service
not just in name only, but also in reality (idiom)
to be unwilling to pass on one's responsibilities to others
fully deserving, without any reservations (idiom); entirely worthy (of a title, honor etc)
tablet announcing the name of leading actor in a theatrical production/by extension, the lead role
leading (role)/heading list of signatories/leading actors (in a show)/starring
to score a victory/to prevail over one's opponents
